EmailTemplate.name: ProSeries - TT brief nurture
EmailTemplate.subject: Please call me so I can help you today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thanks for your interest in ProSeries® Tax! We’re here to help you ever step of the way – from making it easy to become a professional preparer to helping you impress your clients.
You probably know that you have to register as a small business and eFile preparer, but did you know that it takes the IRS 30-45 days to process the requests? We're here to help you through the steps to become a professional tax preparer.
Call me at {!User.Phone} or let me know the best day and time to reach you, and we’ll get you compliant & ready for tax season in no time.
Regards, {!User.Name} ProSeries Tax Consultant {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
PS: Did you know that ProSeries is built on the same platform as TurboTax, so all your clients’ data can flow directly from TurboTax to ProSeries which makes it fast and easy to switch? Intuit Accountants
IMPORTANT: Intuit respects the personal nature of email communication. Every effort is made to offer only information that may be of value to you or your business. If you do not wish to receive marketing email from Intuit in the future, please click here.
If you have any questions or comments, please DO NOT REPLY to this email. Contact Customer Service at 800.765.7777 for assistance. If you receive an email message that appears to come from Intuit but that you suspect is a phishing email, please forward it immediately to spoof@intuit.com. Please visit http://security.intuit.com for additional security information.

All other marks are the property of their respective owners, should be treated as such, and may be registered in various jurisdictions.
Intuit Inc., Customer Communications, 2800 E. Commerce Center Place, Tucson, AZ 85706
